title: Viraatapalem: PC Meena Reporting
overview: Set in the 1980s in the remote and fear-stricken, eerie village of Viraatapalem, which faces a strange chilling curse â€“ every bride dies mysteriously on her wedding day, halting marriages for over a decade. A determined police constable refuses to believe this superstition and, along with a reformed convict, begins to unearth shocking secrets the villagers want hidden.
